full_text: After studying the available evidence, Avi Loeb concluded that the simplest explanation for the exotic strangeness of ‘Oumuamua was that the interstellar object had been created by an intelligent civilisation beyond Earth https://t.co/UGmyus1IbA

localize.full_text: 在研究了现有的证据后，阿维-勒布得出结论，对'Oumuamua'的异国情调的最简单解释是，这个星际物体是由地球以外的智慧文明创造的https://t.co/UGmyus1IbA。
在研究了現有的證據後，阿維-勒布得出結論，對'Oumuamua'的異國情調的最簡單解釋是，這個星際物體是由地球以外的智慧文明創造的https://t.co/UGmyus1IbA。
